backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, channels, categories, access control, and Bacon Cash storage with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high‑level summaries of all frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router, app routes, theme provider, and global layout including the Contact page.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Displays user name and Bacon Cash balance with a button to buy more.
Wraps children with admin‑only access logic using auth hooks and shows denial or loader when appropriate.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Dialog warning users about adult content with confirmation and cancellation options.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: Route guard requiring adult‑content consent before showing protected content.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Generic access‑denied screen with message and button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with handling for cached sessions and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: First‑time user dialog collecting display name and saving an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: Gates child components based on user identity, admin status, and optional channel ownership.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Clickable brand logo button that navigates to the homepage.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Renders a category-specific icon image with optional sizing.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Displays the homepage hero banner with a background image and promotional text.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: Shows a channel preview card with thumbnail, title, category badge, and navigation to the stream.
Form dialog for creating or editing channels, including fields and thumbnail upload handling.
Displays channels in a responsive grid with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Handles thumbnail image selection, upload progress, previewing, and removal.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, navigation, footer, and optional profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Navigation bar for category links and creator studio access.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds a stream via iframe, supporting raw embed codes, YouTube, and Twitch URLs.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Share button using Web Share API with clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Manages user adult-content consent using sessionStorage with functions to grant or revoke consent.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller’s role and admin status using the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, handling login, stored identity loading, and exposing identity state and actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for channel operations and user profile actions using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and theme variables, including light/dark color definitions and custom components.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Admin page listing bacon cash requests with actions to fulfill them and display their status.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Browse page showing categories and recently added channels, with navigation to category pages.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: Page for authenticated users to view balance, request Bacon Cash purchases, and track request statuses.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays channels filtered by category, with adult categories protected by a route guard.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information and a mailto link for reaching the site owner.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Creator dashboard for managing channels, including creation, editing, and deletion with dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Shows stream details and player with edit/delete options for owners or admins.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines overall project metadata and requirements for building the RockHog TV platform. Lists implemented features, architecture notes, and the app’s content, admin, and currency systems.
